vote.title: Authorize (1) an Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and the City of Irving for the relocation of a 48-inch water line within Irving Corporate limits; and (2) the receipt and deposit of funds from the City of Irving for a portion of the construction, construction administration, and material testing costs of the 48-inch water line relocation in the amount of $1,160,447.28 - Estimated Revenue: Water Construction Fund ($1,113,936.43) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($46,510.85)
vote.description: Authorize (1) an Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and the City of Irving for the relocation of a 48-inch water line within Irving Corporate limits; and (2) the receipt and deposit of funds from the City of Irving for a portion of the construction, construction administration, and material testing costs of the 48-inch water line relocation in the amount of $1,160,447.28 - Estimated Revenue: Water Construction Fund ($1,113,936.43) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($46,510.85)
